main.name: Ghayoor Ahmad
main.bio: Web Developer with three years of hands-on experience in identifying web-based user interactions along with designing & implementing highly-responsive user interface components. Proficient in JavaScript, React, Node, API integration, translating designs & wireframes into high-quality code, and writing application interface code via JavaScript and ReactJS workflows. Experienced in WordPress (Theme & Plugin customization ), Elementor, Divi, WPBakery, WooCommerce & Payment gateway integration.
main.contactmessage: DISCUSS A PROJECT OR JUST WANT TO SAY HI? MY INBOX IS OPEN FOR ALL.!

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

mernProject1.title: RR Store - Coupon system of a Blockchain based survey application Real Research
mernProject1.category: Real Research is an innovative, authentic, and reliable platform that offers its services to a large clientele worldwide. With over 3 million users from over 165 countries, the platform provides a space for data collection via fast and trustworthy surveys from real qualified respondents around the world. Sponsors can promote and advertise products, brands, businesses, events, Youtube videos, and more on the Real Research platform. They can also conduct free surveys using the private survey feature
